entry.title: Introduction
entry.summary:
I hope this blog can serve as an educational site for people who are just starting to learn about data science, especially those who do not come from computer science background. I always feel overwhelmed by some of the technicalities especially about web-publishing and version control.

In this first entry …
entry.content:
I hope this blog can serve as an educational site for people who are just starting to learn about data science, especially those who do not come from computer science background. I always feel overwhelmed by some of the technicalities especially about web-publishing and version control.

In this first entry, I will through the way I setup this blog. I wish to acknowledge Chris Moffitt with his Practical Business Python blog, Animesh Bhadra with his step by step tutorials on Pelican and hernantz explaining the submodule method for their inspirations and well written guides on the subject.

entry.title: Gunship
entry.summary:
Gunship is a retro synthwave artist out of the UK.

Revel in Your Time, Tech Noir, Fly for Your Life and The Mountain are all quality songs by Gunship. Check out those amazing music videos!

Also take a look at other retro synthwave artists such as Trevor Something, Droid Bishop …
entry.content:
Gunship is a retro synthwave artist out of the UK.

Revel in Your Time, Tech Noir, Fly for Your Life and The Mountain are all quality songs by Gunship. Check out those amazing music videos!

Also take a look at other retro synthwave artists such as Trevor Something, Droid Bishop, FM-84 and Daniel Deluxe.
